article_title: Biz Bulletin: How to respond to door-to-door sales pitches

article_metadata.description: Q: My neighborhood has had a man trying to sell meat out of his white unmarked van, and is unnerving the area. Does the BBB have any tips on how to handle door-to-door sales people?
